text: is a Japanese politician who has been the Minister of Health, Labour, and Welfare since 2024. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He has been a member of the House of Representatives since 2005. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website in Japanese. title: Takamaro Fukuoka
